nodes.bodyText: Fixed in 77fd602

Wondering if we should just say

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                       Package Choreo observability extension in the executable jars.
          
          
            
                       Package the Choreo observability extension in the executables.
          
      
    
    
  

or

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                       Package Choreo observability extension in the executable jars.
          
          
            
                       Package the Choreo observability extension in the executable JAR file(s).
          
      
    
    
  

for consistency.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -65,6 +65,9 @@ OPTIONS
        --debug
            Run tests in remote debugging mode, only when the '--skip-tests' flag is not used.
 
+       --with-choreo
+           Package Choreo observability extension in the executable jars.

nodes.bodyText: +1 for the 2nd suggestion.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -65,6 +65,9 @@ OPTIONS
        --debug

nodes.bodyText:
This wouldn't apply when ballerina run is used with a JAR right?
Should we say something like

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                       Package Choreo observability extension in the executable jars created while building.
          
          
            
                       Package the Choreo observability extension in the executable when run is used with a source file or a module.

            Run in remote debugging mode.

+           Package Choreo observability extension in the executable jars created while building.

nodes.bodyText: Please check the line length too. IIRC, the maximum we used to have was 80.

@@ -43,6 +43,9 @@ OPTIONS
        --debug

nodes.bodyText:
I actually think we should use "remote debug mode", but let's verify and change this properly. @nadundesilva can you create an issue to track these changes please?

True. +1 for using either of the terms ("remote debugging" or "remote debug"), but for the above context, I also prefer using remote debug mode.
